page.title: 04GUILDFORD:A3/A31 JUNCTION
page.content: This survey was taken on July 6 1985. It was taken by the side of a busy main road near the A3/A31 junction. There were 1528 privately owned cars, 6 cars for public use with a "taxi" sign showing,24 motorbikes and bicycles,26 commercial lorries,58 vans (commercial and privately owned),6 public buses and coaches,8 emergency vehicles _ 4 police cars,2 ambulances, 2 fire-engines _ and 8 drivers with the official learner plate on their vehicle. All these figures were taken down in half an hour, so they were doubled to make up an hour. During the time taken, no Sinclair "C5"s were spotted. Laura Roberts and Judy Foster
